page.title: 20EVENTS
page.content: Millbrook Carnival is held annually on Spring Bank Holiday Monday.It is organised by the Football Club and the Mothers Union.The Carnival Queen and attendants are chosen at an earlier Disco.Carnival Day coincides with the annual French Exchange. Categories included in the Parade,are floats for adults/children,Best adult Best child under 7 yrs and over 7 yrs. Best decorated pram,bike and dog owner Sports are held,Tug of War,Karate Display,Raft Race,Fortune Teller,with various stalls and competitions.Crowds of spectators attend from the surrounding district.The pubs have longer licensing hours.The day ends with a rollicking Disco in the Football Social Club.In earlier years the fair used to be in September in the meadow.Roundabouts and stalls etc.
